website_summaries.verdict: A little pricey, considering the single layer construction, but it gets the job done,  nevertheless. If you like fun and funky prints, this wet bag should be right up your alley.
pros: Single layer fabric with a waterproof coating dries quickly, preventing mold and mildew build up
Sealed seams ensure that liquids stay inside the bag
Machine washable and dryer safe on low
Available in loads of fun prints, including DC comics, Disney characters, and more
cons: The zipper is a little small and prone to sticking

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the nostalgic pattern and the price. Pretty bummed by the washability and durability of this product. I’ve used this bag plus a couple others with cloth diapering. I have washed the following the instructions on the label and the waterproof liner is completely falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE... Falling apart after less than 15 washes/uses
customer_reviews.text: This product is very disappointing. We cloth diaper and this bag has been washed appropriately for a PLU fabrics (not too hot of a wash cycle) and the inside lining is peeling off after less than 15 washes since purchased. Buyer beware. Adorable print... Useless garbage after only a handful of uses. Less than helpful for a cloth diapering family.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, thick quality. Actually larger than I expected. I purchased this to store my breast pump parts in the refrigerator in between uses, as I was tired of wasting ziplocs and I hate silicone storage bags. This works great for this purpose, and it is large enough for 2 flanges still connected to bottles (I use Spectra parts). Also, super easy to wash in between uses. I either throw it in the sink while washing bottles or throw it in the washing machine with the baby's clothes. Either way, super easy and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great for used homemade cleaning cloths!
customer_reviews.text: Inspired by a blog post, I bought this to store our used homemade cleaning cloths that replaced our Clorox wipes- going green. Before this we threw them in the corner of the kitchen or bathroom so they could dry out before I put them in the hamper. I couldn’t stand the sight of them after awhile, needed a better solution. This bag works wonders, holds almost 50 cleaning wipes and they dry out just fine in the bag so they don’t smell before putting in the wash. It’s hangs flat and flush in limited storage spaces and it’s gosh darn cute too with the cactus print!
customer_reviews.author: zoomlittlewing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was awesome! Very durable and the quality was great! The interior had a slight coating to prevent water from soaking through onto the outside if you’re using it as a wet bag I personally used it as a bag to store and transport art supplies and it was the perfect size for what I was looking to do! Overall a great sturdy bag that should last a long time! It’s a great multipurpose bag for sure :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the company directly prior to purchasing this, and they confirmed it is waterproof. However, it is not at all! I use large ziplock bags to defrost frozen chicken at home, and I have been looking for a reusable alternative. The size of this was comparable and with it being waterproof, I figured I'd finally found it. However, raw chicken juice leaked all over my fridge out of this bag. Clearly not waterproof. Do not buy if you're looking for that feature. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Boothie

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! My husband was skeptical and said it wasn't a necessity for when we went out our vacation. I have to tell you--they really did come in handy!! They were great for brining wet swimsuits back after our snorkel excursion, traveling back home, it was great to put bottles of liquid in in case they were to break during the flight back, and even came in handy for putting dry goods in that we didn't want wet at the beach. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Appabot

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, but water resistant
customer_reviews.text: We love this bag, but note that it is not fully waterproof; it's more accurately water resistant. We originally purchased it because we wanted to put a wet bathing suit in it. For background, when leaving vacation, we usually need to check out of the room hours before our flight; so, we usually go swimming while we wait, which means we need to put a wet bathing suit in our suitcase. It was probably in the suitcase for about 5-6 hours, and it leaked through the bag. Not a lot, but enough to get surrounding items wet. So, if it's a few hours, you might be ok, but it isn't 100% waterproof. Otherwise, great idea!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the poop inside
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has had it. Poopy diaper out at Target. I went to throw the diaper in the diaper bag but my wife told me to grab this bag out. Little did I know how awesome this was. It keeps all the stink in and looks cute too. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Not worth the money. Looks like it’ll rip with the first use. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag at first; we have the blue "tropics" print one. Unfortunately, it just doesnt hold up. We wash the wet bags with the diapers, and my other bag from another brand is still going strong and conceals even poop odors. This bag though...it has started to delaminate. That means the waterproof lining inside is coming apart. The bag gets damp from the inside and, when stored inside the diaper bag with a pee diaper, will still leave the things it touches damp THROUGH the wet bag. Naturally, this is a problem. So we will be either tossing this bag and replacing eith the preferred brand, or will use this for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Detronyx

customer_reviews.title: Wet Bathing Suit holder
customer_reviews.text: My babies are all grown up, I ordered this item for taking my wet bathing suit home from the gym. So much better than plastic bags! My gym bag has a wet pocket but it never dried out between uses, and gathering up my wet gear was a pain. I put the suit right into the little bag, zip it up. Then when I’m ready to wash it it’s so much easier. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jerseymom

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these bags! I keep finding more and more ideas for them but I need some new patterns. I keep one in the diaper bag folded up for blow outs, one in each kids room for super stained clothes so I don't have to sort laundry, and now I'm keeping our dry bathing suits in one so it's easy to pack for the beach. I can put soaking wet suits in it and it doesn't leak. This bag is a good size too...the kids can fit a lot of clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Atwood

customer_reviews.title: great for organized travel
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Ive used them almost every weekend since I bought them. I dont have kids but I had a friend using them and thought they could be so versatile and they are! I use them to bring gym clothes or when packing to keep things more organized. they will perfectly fit a daily outfit for a weekend trip. The patterns are cute, easy to wash and i love that they have a clip handle on them. I can also fit a pair of sneakers in (roughly size 7.5) which is also great for traveling and keeping dirt off other clothes!
customer_reviews.author: brelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for diaper bags and purses
customer_reviews.text: I keep this folded up in my baby's diaper bag just in case we have a wet or soiled clothes especially on long daytrips or an overnight stay. It folds up very small and takes up virtually no space when not in use. I have also used it in my purse when we are going on a quick outing - I toss some diapers in it, a small wipes pouch and a onesie and we are good to go. This is so versatile it could absolutely be used for others thing not related to baby. In the future I could see myself using it for cosmetics or overnight toiletry or even my own soiled undergarments.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a baby, toddler, or a child this is so useful! I have used this for so many different things, it is a diaper bag MUST for me. From soiled clothes, diapers, and bathing suits to dirty spoons, or food jars. This comes in handy. I have went swimming and my swimsuit, my husbands, and my daughters all fit in this bag. It keeps the wet or dirty things away from everything else and keeps from getting everything wet or dirty. You can air this bag out and you can wash and dry it as normal. No mold, no issues. It is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle (Elle)

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I've only used my bag a handful of times and it completely delaminated on me. I've washed it with the same routine as my prefold covers (3 different brands, all with no issue) and hang dried every time. I had two barely wet diapers in there and when I got home the whole wet bag and anything touching it in my diaper bag was wet. The last thing I want to do with a newborn is extra, unnecessary laundry and waste time checking every item in my diaper bag to make sure it's not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when we switched to cloth diapering. I needed something to throw dirty diapers into when we were out and about. This works perfectly for that! I also don’t notice any smell when using it either so that is a huge plus! Then, I can just toss it in the wash with the rest of the diapers and it is like new again! I will be purchasing more to use for fruit/veggie pouches and snacks as well to save my diaper bag from spills!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these bags are made with quality. It is evident in the stitching and method used. This bag is not waterproof as it will leak by the seams. Compared to other bags though the leakage at the seams are much much less. I tested this by putting water in the bag and hanging in the shower. I came back after an hour to see how much water was left and also watched where it was dripping from. The bag is water resistant. Overall I would recommend this and will buy a second one myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlyne

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE SIZE - not as big as they were 1-2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: CHECK THE SIZE - sadly, these have changed size. Sadly, these are not the same large bags I got for my older sons swim stuff at camp. Wish they had changed to offer the same, larger size and a smaller cheaper one when costs rose. But they are excellent, not too thick so pack tiny and easy, but excellent material and lots of choices. CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT and they took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: smwwatergirl

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The best I can say about this bag is it has a cute pattern on it. Other than that, it's a very flimsy, thin little envelope. A ziplock bag would probably work better.
customer_reviews.author: E S K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works super well
customer_reviews.text: I used to carry my pump parts around in a ziploc bag, which I had to replace multiple times a week because it quickly got gross. I try to be environmentally conscious so that was bothering me and I bought this wet/dry bag. It has been working great, whenever it gets a little dirty inside with milk I just rinse it off, and I can throw it in the laundry whenever I run a load and then it dries in the dryer with everything else. So convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of purchasing a wet bag for my nephew’s baby shower. I have used several brands of wet bags but never bumkins but I have used bumkins diapers before. I have enjoyed the fabric, fit and quality of the cloth diapers in my son so i figured that the wet bag would be great. I was disappointed upon opening the package but still gifted the product. The material is thin and seemed cheap and not that durable. I believe my brother uses and likes the product, I however would not purchase againz
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Caltabiano

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, doesn’t keep smell in
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a wet bag for my sons disposable diapers and it does not keep the smell in like the other ones I use. Was expecting better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: love2review

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for traveling, I've used it for storing dirty cloth diapers on the go/home, wet swim suits ect. I have better material wet bags but this ones a pretty good one.. it doesn't have a liner on the inside so if things are really wet it will leak out the seams because seams are a weak point for this style of bag or any wet bag really. I have grown really fond of the snap style loop on the bag. I have some that are just elastic loops but I like that I can snap this one onto stuff and even if it's heavy the loops don't stretch if hanging off something.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than you think!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when this came in the mail because it looked smaller than I had anticipated. I purchased it for swim lessons and I really wanted to be able to keep at least one towel and our swimsuits in it. Low and behold... it all fits! Not even snuggly, there is plenty of room. It does a great job of keeping moisture in and I just turn it inside to dry. No smells or stains so far. The print is also super cute. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim lessons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my daughter started ISR swim lessons so that I would have something to put her reusable swim diapers in after each lesson. All of the babies have to wear two just to be safe. I was a little skeptical if this bag would work because those things can hold a lot of water! So far I’ve been using it for 4 weeks and IT IS SO AWESOME! No leaking whatsoever so I can just toss it in my bag and not worry about anything getting soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Jilian

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight and doesn't take up space. Fits Potette Plus.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Bumkins wet bag and snack bags. I've been using them since my first child was born 6 years ago. It's durable, soft and lightweight. I love that it becomes so thin and flat when I fold it or roll it and doesn't take up any space. I prefer this to fabric wet bags for that reason. I purchased another one because I started using it for carrying a Potette Plus (portable potty seat) for my potty-training daughter and needed another one to use as wet bag for dirty/wet clothes. Potette Plus fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: justthewatch

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in diaper bag for accidents
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - I've washed it a couple times now and it holds up well. I've even washed it in hot water and it didn't melt or anything. - It is bigger than expected - Light weight - Cute design Cons: - The inside has a weird waxy feel. Makes me not want to wash it with other stuff because I dont know what it is. I have though and it seems fine. - its recommended that you wash in warm. I use it for my baby's clothes when she leaks out of her diaper and we aren't home. It would be nice to wash in hot to kill all the germs.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wet clothes from getting mildewy
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my son’s swim clothes and towel after he goes to swimming lessons in the morning through his school. The wet items would sit in this bag all day zipped up and never smell which was amazing. I thought it would get mildewy but not at all. It dries really quickly once it airs out. Great quality to hold his swim trunks, swim shirt and kids towel. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megkat10

customer_reviews.title: Super Kawaii
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bumkins product and when I saw the hello kitty I told myself omg I have to get it and I’m so glad i did! The quality is good and the design is also super cute! Definitely gonna buy another one to have as backup maybe the Mickey Mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Drying Caution!
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself was stiff, very much unlike the rest of my various wet bags. Worked well with my cloth diapers until it accidentally went through the dryer 1 time and completely delaminated! The bag is still functional, but I can't use it for cloth diapers or cloth pads anymore since it has completely lost its water resistance. We are usually pretty good about not putting our wet bags in the dryer, but it happens from time to time on accident and NONE of our other wet bags have ever delaminated like this one did. And I was excited to have the gaming wetbag...oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the higher price
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific bags! I use ours as a snack bag for my kids. The strap has a snap to open and close to wrap around things, which is perfect for hanging off a stroller handle or backpack strap. I bought a second bag to use as my daughter’s preschool art supply bag. Happy to pay a little more to have the cuter prints than competitors!
customer_reviews.author: Halee Petzinger

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet, I just got it in the mail, but it's soooooo cute! It's a lot bigger than I thought it would be, but that's great and it folds up super easily. I like the snap loop on the side if you need to hang it on something
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Try them you will love them
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 of these bags for gym visits. They are so much more than just wet bags. They have become shoe totes, cosmetic and personal products bags, clean clothing bags, wet bags, and all around stash bags. People comment on how cute they are and are a bit taken back when I reveal original purpose, purchase origin, and price point expecting a higher place in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Febesmom

customer_reviews.title: Warm machine wash
customer_reviews.text: It’s my to-go bags for swimming. It’s my fourth bags from bumpkin now. We have a lot of wet clothes, towels and swimming suits, wet suits every time we go to beach. I tried the wet bag from other brand also but they are not warm machine wash. It’s convenient to wash the bags with other clothes together.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I use these for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags all the time! The best use was in Disney World. We used them to carry extra clothes for our little one. We also used it for wet bathing suits from water rides. It kept everything in our bag from getting wet while we finished out day in the Park after changing! I also use this bag to keep my muddy running shoes in my gym bag from getting dirt all over my clean clothes. I highly recommend this product it is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kelbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great for reusables
customer_reviews.text: I don't have kids, but I use this in my bathroom for reusable pads. This bag can hold a lot; an entire cycle's worth, and there's not been any issue with smell or mess seeping through. I wash it inside-out, along with my smaller travel wet bags, and let them all air dry. It only takes an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern and keeps the wet in
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have a few other wet dry bags and they all seem to leak. This one hasn't yet and I'm keeping my fingers crossed that it stays that way. This bag comes to the water park with us and bathings suits go into it. It dries quickly and it is very easy to clean. I also am such a fan of the pattern since I was an original Nintendo kid so it makes me a bit nostalgic.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Arizonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wet bag for swim gear!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I got this for use after water aerobics classes. These are perfect for putting wet suit and swim shoes in so that the rest of my gym bag and contents stay dry. I have several brands of wet bags, but this one is the best size and material. And totally cute! Now I am giving two of them to my water class buddies as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to wrap a handmade baby blanket & beanie I made as a gift. I love gift wrap but don’t love that it’s something that gets thrown out. I love using things to wrap my handmade gifts in that the individual can repurpose! These are great!!! They come in such adorable patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for moms!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to transport "dirty" clothes home from daycare. I love that it has a loop to attach to a bag. The design is so cute, too! I can imagine lots of uses for these, including travel or even to stow a wet bathing suit. If I traveled more I would use these for pump parts.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I just love these bags. The color and pattern options are great, especially the watercolor flower, and they are perfect for a multitude of uses. I keep one in the diaper bag just in case I need it for dirty clothes or something, and I use one for my clean and dirty pump parts. They're great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take hiking in lieu of a plastic sack For lunch, and for my kid to use at summer camp to take her lunch in on days they hike. It’s perfect. We also use the sandwhich bags and snack bags. Just wish they had some more plain or non-girly designs, for Hubs and Papa to use.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth Diapers
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in both the Nintendo and Finding Nemo pattern. Both are very cute. If you are buying these to store/carry cloth diapers, it can fit about 6-8 stuffed pockets or all in ones. (In the picture I took there are 3 stuffed pockets and 2 all in ones with room for a few more) The strap has a snap for hanging which makes it great to snap onto a stroller handle.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach or pool bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this and I’m so glad i came across it! No more wet bags with all of our swimsuits or having to put a target bag in there to keep everything from getting wet. I can keep this in my beach bag and throw all of our wet items in it to protect the rest of our things from getting soaked! Hey also have the CUTEST prints!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my pump parts bag and I love it! Print is beautiful. The zipper is a little iffy, seems like it might break soon but it’s just a little stuck in the middle. It washes nicely and keeps the pump parts contained and clean. Plenty of room to spare. Could be used for many cloth diapers (probably 5 or 6), swimsuits or such.
customer_reviews.author: jtaft

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with Minnie
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Minnie! My baby girl loves Minnie Mouse and this bag is so cute. We use it for cloth diapers while on the go and it has never leaked! It washes well and has held up great so far! I have seen some cheaper wet bags that are the same size but I splurged for this because of Minnie!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Zip lock replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bo more ziplock bags for daycare! We used to need two a day for baby bottles and my eco-conscious heart was breaking. I wouldnt store spaghetti sauce in here, but it's great for keeping mildly dirty/ wet things contained. We machine washed them and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: natascha

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wet/ dry bag for Disney to take with our family. This bag was used several times during our trip. One day is was used to put a wet outfit in when our 18 month old grandson spilled a drink. It was put under neither in the stroller bag just incase it leaked through, later jackets got piled on top. And the jackets stayed dry. Another day we used it to put smaller toys in for the grandkids. Perfect. I will order a few more of these lots of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Great for diapers
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my cloth diapers at daycare. I put my dry ones in to take in the morning and bring my wet ones home in it every night. Easy to wash, just toss in with the rest of your diaper load. No smells lingering with a good wash routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Use for pump parts
customer_reviews.text: It's actually bigger than I thought it would be. I use it for my pump parts and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: The Dodson Family

customer_reviews.title: Not really water resistant
customer_reviews.text: The bag really isn't water resistant. I put a few wet cloth diapers in it, and the wetness seeped into the outside of the bag. I ended up getting Baby Goal wet bags, and those are much higher quality and the bag doesnt get wet from having wet cloth diapers inside. I still use this bag for dirty clothes, just not wet items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and that the bag has a button clasp for hanging. It fits about six diapers and inserts. It is not smell proof or very resistant though which is a major downside for me. We never put poopy diapers in the wet bag, so I'm not even referring to the stench of poop diapers, I'm saying you can still smell the pee diapers. It is really too bad, because i love the pattern!
customer_reviews.author: AshTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my breast pumping parts and for used bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I was searching for something to put my pumping parts when going to work. The bag will fit three sets of pumping parts. I used one for clean and then one for the rinsed out dirty ones. Everything goes into my pumping bag with no water leaking from the bag. I also use it to put dirty bottles when going out and I have a mother one to put dirty baby’s clothes. The bags are the perfect size and they are easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift but I have the same one in another print. I can say that mine has held up over 2 years already with no issues. This one was super cute and seemed like the same good quality I’ve come to expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to keep in a diaper bag. I have used it for wet bathing suits, dirty clothes and poopy clothes. It keep everything dry in the diaper bag when I put 2 wet bathing suits in there. My LO had a blow out at a restaurant and I was able to throw her dirty clothes in the bag. The bag was easy to clean. I just threw it in the wash and it was as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: C Mahorney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a diaper bag or at the pool
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the diaper bag for soiled clothes and take it to the pool to put my daughter's swim suite in when we are finished. Haven't had a leak yet. Would be a perfect gift for a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Andre

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I use the bag for when I go swimming at the gym. It keeps all of my other things in there dry. I don't I've only washed it a few times and usually just flip it inside out when I want it to dry out. Definitely need a bigger one to fit my towel though!
customer_reviews.author: saltybadgerbooks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got got! The Disney branded print suckered me into buying this wetbag. I followed the washing instructions on the tag. The tpu separated and started falling off after just two washes. The unfinished edges of fabric by the zipper started fraying and getting stuck in the zipper after one wash. Looks and feels like something I could have ordered from wish for a buck.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Quezada

customer_reviews.title: You need this bag if your child swims!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful! My son had weekly pool therapy and it contained his wet trunks after without making the rest of the backpack damp. I’ve even left things in there around a day with no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Low quality material
customer_reviews.text: Cute but cheap material. Don't see it lasting long or being that water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: NYreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the bags for my daughters diaper bag. I use one to put her clean clothes in case she needs to change. The second bag I use to put any dirty clothes or toys. The bag seems durable so far and is a good size. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Already used this twice with enough room for three suits plus goggles and water shoes. Washed it in the washer and hung to dry without problems. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica F.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wet swimsuit bag
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wet bag to bring along on a 20 day Roadtrip to hold wet swimsuits between hotel stops. It honestly was one before trip purchase that was trip changing for me. After I declared my love for this bag to my children the conversation of how sometimes the simple/small things that help make your life easier can make you so happy as you get older :) Before we were using the plastic laundry bag that hangs in the hotel closets. This bag holds 3 swimsuits ( 2 swim trunks and 1 swimsuit) perfectly. 4 would fit fine but fill the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Paricka

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a god send. We live out of state from family. It is a proven fact that my children will spill something, be ill, or have a blowout every single time we are on a long car ride. These bags are great for putting their soaked, smelly clothes in until we can get somewhere we can wash them out. Very leak and odor proof. Also great for beach/pool days and putting wet suits and toys in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wardwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute wet bag, it’s so lightweight, and folds up so well when not in use. We use one in our diaper bag for dirty or wet clothes and another for my sons extra change of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Ke44

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased Bumkins products in the past and I always love them! This wet bag is lightweight, durable, & easy to wash. I store it in my little jujube minibe just in case! Also purchased the matching pouches. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and it fits my daughter swim shoes, suit, and towel so the size is amazing! I am disappointed with the so called waterproof statement tho.. I picked up my daughter bag from daycare and water had soaked through the bag and in her backpack and everything was wet
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A must for a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: We keep this folded up in our sons diaper bag for his clothes when he has accidents. The inside is water resistant so we don’t have to worry about it. I’ve also used it to carry the bottles into daycare and we plan to use it for wet swimwear while on vacation. It’s a very functional item.
customer_reviews.author: Haley P.

customer_reviews.title: It really is waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for hauling our wet suits home after swim class and to store my dirty gym clothes in and it works great! It really is water proof and is so easy to rinse out and let dry. So much better then using a plastic bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. i will be purchasing more wet bags in the future. i use it for my son's dirty clothes, i throw it in the washer and it comes out great. I use it for snacks, as a mini diaper bag sometimes when i don't need much stuff. It a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little pouch. It's pretty, water resistant and fits quite a bit of wet clothes inside - wet stretchy pants/shirt/3 bathing suits. This is perfect. Even my 6 yo daughter loves taking it to school for her swim days. Very easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Balmoja

customer_reviews.title: Locks in smells and leak free
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about how these would hold in the smell and if they would leak But after using this product for about a few months i can say they are amazing. No leaks and the bag holds the diaper smell in so its not noticeable. I use these at daycare and the teachers say it works better than the diper genie.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for my mom who’s been traveling and needed a wet bag. It work amazing she said keeping the wet item in and the other clothes dried around it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: No leaking!
customer_reviews.text: I swim 4-5 days per week. I put my wet swim wear in this bag and throw it into my duffel bag. It does NOT leak. I wash it with my suit and let air dry. These little bags are just what I needed to keep everything in my bag dry.
customer_reviews.author: BernzieBee

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was just what I was looking for! It was bigger than I expected so I liked that. I like the snap handle too so I could attach it to my pool bag! Great for kids suits!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Huppmann

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but strap broke
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great however the strap did break off within 2 weeks of light use. Other than that great for wet/dirty clothes and diapers or trash until you find an actual trash.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: These wet/dry bags work great for storing my used pump parts. They are cute, economical and easy to clean. Will find a thousand uses once I no longer need them for pump parts.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Family

customer_reviews.title: Disney Wet Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold my poncho and crocs in my Disney park go bag! It keeps the items together when they're dry and separated from the rest of my stuff when they are wet! Great size! One day where there was a zero percent chance of rain and I didn't want to ride water rides, I actually was able to zip a whole extra outfit for the evening in, including a sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Webb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying my son has special needs and has went through clothes several times and with use this a lot and it doesn’t stink and it keeps everything in his backpack dry.
customer_reviews.author: AutismMom

customer_reviews.title: Great price and size
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this I was worried it was too big. Until we had a really long day out and an explosion in the newborn insert of the car seat, which then had to be put in the bag. Really cute prints and very well made. Thin fabric folds down easy into the side pocket of our diaper bag when it's not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a friend to get a wet bag and I am so glad I did! I love the design on this one and the bag is exactly what I expected. Its perfect for wet/ dirty baby clothing after changes and Ive been told its a good bag to have with you for breast pumping! I will probably invest in a wet/dry bag later on to separate the wet vs dry (obviously). However, so far Im very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza B.

customer_reviews.title: Bag not lined
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not lined and will not keep water from seeping out. Submitted for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for swimming outings!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those outings to the pool! The size is great and it easily folds so compact to just keep in a little zipper pocket in the diaper bag. Bonus- so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Diaper Bag Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Been a lifesaver too many times! No one wants to throw wet clothes in their diaper bag with all their dry things!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L. Montagno

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than they look and feel, pleased by the value.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I thought they felt a little flimsy at first, but they do the job and don't retain any odors. I bought three of these when my Alva ones crapped out and were just... no longer non-permeable after a year and a half. I wash in hot water because we have hard water where we live, but still, I did not know this was a thing that could happen. If these go at least as long I'll be pleased--time will tell! But for now very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aerin Hohensee

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our beach vacation in hopes that it would be great to put my little ones spit up clothes in as he get car sick. Come to find out the dang zipper was broke and never worked so I never even got to use it. Make sure you check the product beforehand. Seems like it’s cheap!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old is starting swim lessons next week. I wanted something to put his wet clothes in. This bag is plenty big for a toddler swim suit! It could fit probably 2-3 toddler suits and 2 kid suits.
customer_reviews.author: KWilly

customer_reviews.title: Great wet/dry bags
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these bags. I initially bought one to use in our baby bag for dirty clothes. I didn’t know at the time that these are used for cloth diapers. They are also superb for using if you’ve gone swimming and need to keep the wet clothes separate from the dry/clean clothes. The bags are machine washable and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Use it for my sons dirty clothes when he goes to grandmas. It also kept the water in when I threw my bikini in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great for soiled baby clothes. Resists absorbing smells. Can be easily washed in the washing machine along with baby's laundry. Cute print as well. The snapping strap is incredibly helpful to attach to the outside of diaper bag if filled with clothes/burp clothes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but I'm excited to have it on hand. I got it to hold my daughter's swimsuit after we go to the pool or a splash pad. Really cute pattern, nice size, folds up small easily for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming gear
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a trip where we planned on swimming frequently and not always having a lot of time to dry our suits and towels between travel. This waterproof bag worked great and kept everything else in our bags dry! Easy to use and washed up well in the washing machine when we returned home - no smell with damp suits in it throughout the trip either!
customer_reviews.author: emmyg

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing wet/dry bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extra large perfect for change of clothes and then some! The handle clips onto my stroller. And when not in use I can roll it up and stick it inside my diaper bag and it takes up no space. Bumkins has done it again! Only downside is the Shipping takes way longer than it needs too.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriopartyof4

customer_reviews.title: Leakage not a worry
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to place wet items from swim class in; this does it. My suit, towel, cap, goggles ,and flipflops all fit inside and bag does not bulge. The other contents in my bag such as a paperback I would read, remained dry.
customer_reviews.author: EWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Has been great to have this summer when toting home wet clothes from the pool and splash pad. It doesn't leak and is large enough to fit 2-4 sets of wet kids clothes, depending on their size. It is not big enough to fit a towel. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love these for pump parts and swim lessons!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great - I bought two, and use one for our wet suits after swim lessons and the other for transporting and storing my pump parts each day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for her wet swim clothes. She puts it in her backpack and it hasn’t leaked yet. She’s taken it to a few diff. Camps and has used it to the pool also.
customer_reviews.author: surf.mommy

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional and sweet
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. My little high loves Mickey. Have used to extra clothes, dirty clothes, to transport diapers & wipes. Many uses
customer_reviews.author: DD

product_meta.title: Bumkins Waterproof Wet Bag, Washable, Reusable for Travel, Beach, Pool, Stroller, Diapers, Dirty Gym Clothes, Wet Swimsuits, Toiletries, Electronics, Toys, 12x14 – Watercolors
product_meta.description: Size:Wet Bag| Style:Bumkins| Color:WatercolorsThe better alternative to single-use plastic bags, our reusable wet bags are made from the same easy-wipe waterproof fabric as Bumkins award-winning SuperBib. Our bags feature heat-sealed seams for true waterproof protection. A smooth zipper closure locks away the mess and single-ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Wet bags are great for carrying diapers, dirty gym clothes and wet swimsuits. Not just for wet stuff – these bags make excellent organizers for toys, accessories, toiletries, electronics, travel and more! With a snap handle, snap your bag wherever you need it – stroller, changing table or suitcase. Plus, they’re safe to use. BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free. Machine washable. Measures 12”x14”. Fits approximately 6 cloth diapers. Bags are single compartment, non-gusseted, non-insulated and non-stretch. Designed in Arizona, responsibly made in China.
feature_bullets: REUSE AND REDUCE WASTE – The better alternative to single-use plastic bags. Bumkins Wet Bags with single ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Without a cotton layer, stains and smells don't stick to your bag. A smooth zipper closure locks away the mess. Machine washable – use over and over again!
WATERPROOF – Bumkins signature fabric is 100% polyester with a waterproof coating embedded into the fabric and our heat-sealed seams keep the mess where it belongs – inside the bag.
LAB TESTED – At Bumkins, we take pride in our rigorous product testing to ensure you have the safest possible products. Our bags are BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free.
EASY-TO-CLEAN – Our fabric is wipeable and machine washable. Turn inside-out to wash. To extend the life of our reusable bags, we recommend air drying our quick-dry fabric.

LOTS OF USES – Not just for wet stuff – these bags make excellent organizers for toys, accessories, toiletries, electronics, travel and more! With a snap handle, snap your bag wherever you need it – stroller, changing table or suitcase.
